result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicole J Berther was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and costs/DNA to be paid within 90 days; alternate 11 days jail w/huber.

DNA paid along with fine within 90 days;

As of 8/29/2016:   Pursuant to Supreme Court decision in State v Elward, 2015 WI App 51, 363, DNA surcharge is vacated and modified to zero.  Refund check was issued to deft./poster.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nicole J Berther

defendant.name: Berther, Nicole J

records.addlTxt: re: DNA surcharge refund letter signed by Judge Ralph M. Ramirez.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Jayne Davis Dewire appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Nicole J Berther in court with attorney Patrick C. Brennan.

State moves to amend to a Misdemeanor Obstructing.
Up front restitution has been paid.
Defense has no objections.

Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to the amended charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the amended charge.

Court orders the following:
Fine: $316
DNA Surcharge:  $200
To be paid in full within 90 Days.
Alternater: 11 Days in the Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 26, 2014 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Nicole J Berther in court with attorney Patrick C. Brennan.  Margaret Drees appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requests another date. ADA Szczupakiewicz is not available. Court grants request.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 26, 2014 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 19, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Nicole J Berther in court with attorney Patrick C. Brennan.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests one more date so he can speak to the DA to resolve this matter. Court grants request.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 19, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 23, 2014 at 02:30 pm.

  Hearing scheduled for August 29, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Motion hearing on August 7, 2014 at 08:15 am.

Preliminary hearing on July 3, 2014 at 08:15 am.
